languages.text: "Если прижмет — немедленно вызывайте нас". {n}Соломон стучит пальцем по воксу. Повернувшись к отряду, он набирает в легкие воздух и ревет:{/n} "Отряд Дельта-Кси — формация А-48, пошел, пошел, пошел!"

traits.locale_text: "Если понадобится помощь — свяжитесь по воксу". {n}Соломон поворачивается к своему отряду, набирает в легкие воздух и ревет:{/n} "Отряд Альфа — формация Б-56, пошел, пошел, пошел!"

languages.text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"
languages.original_text: "Если прижмет — немедленно вызывайте нас". {n}Соломон стучит пальцем по воксу. Повернувшись к отряду, он набирает в легкие воздух и ревет:{/n} "Отряд Дельта-Кси — формация А-48, пошел, пошел, пошел!"

traits.locale_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

"If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

"If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

"If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

"If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

languages.text: «Si encuentra problemas, llámenos de inmediato». {n}Solomorne toca el voco con un dedo. Se gira hacia su escuadrón, toma aire y ruge:{/n} «¡Escuadrón Delta-Xi, formación A-48! ¡Vamos, vamos, vamos!».
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: «Si encuentra problemas, llámenos de inmediato». {n}Solomorne toca el voco con un dedo. Se gira hacia su escuadrón, toma aire y ruge:{/n} «¡Escuadrón Delta-Xi, formación A-48! ¡Vamos, vamos, vamos!».

languages.text: “如果你遇到麻烦的话，立刻呼叫我们。”{n}索罗蒙用手指轻轻敲了敲他的通讯器。随后，他转向他的队员，深吸一口气，大吼道：{/n}“德尔塔小队，A-48号队形！前进！”
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你遇到麻烦的话，立刻呼叫我们。”{n}索罗蒙用手指轻轻敲了敲他的通讯器。随后，他转向他的队员，深吸一口气，大吼道：{/n}“德尔塔小队，A-48号队形！前进！”

languages.text: « En cas de problème, appelez-nous immédiatement, » {n}dit Solomorne en tapotant son vox du bout des doigts. Puis, il se tourne vers son escouade et inspire un grand coup avant d'aboyer :{/n} « Escouade Delta-Xi, en formation A-48 ! Allez, allez, allez ! »
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: « En cas de problème, appelez-nous immédiatement, » {n}dit Solomorne en tapotant son vox du bout des doigts. Puis, il se tourne vers son escouade et inspire un grand coup avant d'aboyer :{/n} « Escouade Delta-Xi, en formation A-48 ! Allez, allez, allez ! »

languages.text: 「もし何かが起これば、すぐに私たちに連絡してください」{n}ソロモーンは指で彼のヴォックスを叩く。彼のチームの方を向き、肺一杯の空気を吸い込み、大声で叫ぶ。{/n}「デルタ-Xiチーム、フォーメーションA-48！ゴー、ゴー、ゴー！」
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: 「もし何かが起これば、すぐに私たちに連絡してください」{n}ソロモーンは指で彼のヴォックスを叩く。彼のチームの方を向き、肺一杯の空気を吸い込み、大声で叫ぶ。{/n}「デルタ-Xiチーム、フォーメーションA-48！ゴー、ゴー、ゴー！」

languages.text: "Başınız belaya girecek olursa hemen bize haber verin." {n}Solomorne, parmağıyla voksuna dokunuyor. Takımına dönüp havayı ciğerlerine çekiyor ve kükrüyor.{/n} "Delta-Hi takımı... A-48 düzeni! İlerleyin!"
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: "Başınız belaya girecek olursa hemen bize haber verin." {n}Solomorne, parmağıyla voksuna dokunuyor. Takımına dönüp havayı ciğerlerine çekiyor ve kükrüyor.{/n} "Delta-Hi takımı... A-48 düzeni! İlerleyin!"

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr auf Probleme stoßen, ruft uns umgehend." {n}Solomorne tippt mit einem Finger auf sein Vox. Schließlich wendet er sich seinen Leuten zu und brüllt:{/n} "Delta-Xi ... Formation A-48! Los, los, los!"
languages.original_text: "If you get into trouble, call us immediately." {n}Solomorne taps his finger on his vox. Turning to his squad, he sucks in a lungful of air and roars,{/n} "Delta-Xi squad — formation A-48! Go, go, go!"

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr auf Probleme stoßen, ruft uns umgehend." {n}Solomorne tippt mit einem Finger auf sein Vox. Schließlich wendet er sich seinen Leuten zu und brüllt:{/n} "Delta-Xi ... Formation A-48! Los, los, los!"
